medical_history.chief_complaint: Confusion, automatic behavior, and nearly continuous body twitches.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presented with a 24-hour history of confusion and nearly continuous body twitches. She experienced three similar episodes lasting a few hours during the preceding 6 months.

medical_history.social_history: Graduated from college; did not smoke or use alcohol or illicit drugs.
